column4: Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
G-Guess I'll go to the nurse and explain the situation and uhm…
Don't worry about it. I've got them right here. Go ahead and take them later, okay?

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: We're still kids, you know! We need to go to the nurse's office!
Just trust me, okay? If you get pregnant, just have the baby.
I'll take care of everything else.
Y-You can't just say that! We can't raise a baby on our own! I-It's not like you can take resp--
!? A-Are you sure about that?! Can you really? It's a really big deal, you know!
…O-Okay. I-If you say so. ….It's not like I… mind having your kids or anything, you know? I was just…
I know. Don't worry. You're the best.
